caption: Safe Core AA SDK
title: Get started with Safe <u>CORE</u> Account Abstraction SDK

items.title: Protocol Kit
items.text:
• Modular and customizable smart contract accounts
  • Battle-tested security
  • Transaction Batching

items.title: Auth Kit
items.text:
• Easy on-boarding using Web3Auth
  • Social and wallet logins
  • Get users started that do not have a wallet yet

items.title: Relay Kit
items.text:
• Gas-less experiences using Gelato
  • Sponsored transaction
  • Pay fees in ERC-20 tokens

items.title: Onramp Kit
items.text:
• Fiat on-ramping using Stripe
  • Pay using credit card
